p: Regarding Table 4, our results clearly showed that after a 12-week intervention, levels of CAT, GPx, and SOD significantly increased in groups 2 and 3 compared to group 1. Although a significant decrease in case of MDA was seen in groups 2 and 3, there was no significant difference in comparison with group 1. Moreover, according to Table 5, levels of FBS in group 3, and insulin and HOMA-IR in group 2 significantly decreased compared to group 1.
